index-content.head_title: Document Redaction Solution. Edit or remove any sensitive data.
index-content.head_description: Remove, redact, or hide text, images, or metadata in PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, images, and more. Use our library in your .NET, Java, Python, or cloud-based applications.
index-content.title: Document Redaction Library
index-content.description_0: Hide or remove private information from various file types.
index-content.description_1: Edit text or images to eliminate sensitive content.
index-content.description_2: Manage file metadata using our advanced features.

platforms.title: Platform Independence
platforms.description: {{ProdShortName}} library supports the following operating systems and frameworks:

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} at a Glance
features.description: A solution to manage content in PDFs, Office documents, images, and other business files.

feature_1.title: Remove or Edit Text
feature_1.content: Find and redact sensitive text in your documents with ease.

feature_2.title: Redact Images
feature_2.content: Easily hide image areas in your files without extra effort.

feature_3.title: Manage Metadata
feature_3.content: Remove or replace metadata such as the author in Word documents or EXIF data in images.

feature_4.title: Advanced Features
feature_4.content: Search for data to redact using regular expressions or AI integration.

formats.title: 30+ File Formats Supported
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports redaction operations across all widely used business file formats.

code_samples.index_description: Typical use cases of {{ProdShortName}} redaction operations.

actions.title: Ready to Get Started?
actions.description: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free or request a license.
actions.description_index: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free on your platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most commonly asked questions.

item_1.question: Does the {{ProdShortName}} library require any third-party software to manipulate documents?
item_1.answer: {{ProdShortName}} does not require any external software like Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, or others.

item_2.question: Can I try the {{ProdShortName}} library before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Yes, you can try {{ProdShortName}} without purchasing a license. It works in trial mode, which adds trial badges and limits output to the first 3 pages. To test without restrictions, request a 30-day temporary license. For more details, [see]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What license options are available?
item_3.answer: We offer several license types based on your development and distribution needs. These include developer-based, site-based, and Metered licenses depending on usage. Learn more [here]({{PricingUrl}}).

cloud_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Low-Code APIs
cloud_links.description: Integrate document redaction into any application using our cloud-based REST API.

item_1.content: Use cURL commands with our RESTful Cloud API to redact documents in a wide range of supported file formats.

item_2.content: Extract images, text, and metadata or redact documents using templates in Microsoft .NET applications.

item_3.content: Java SDK for redacting documents and extracting data within your Java-based applications.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} No-Code Apps
app_links.description: A web-based app that enables you to redact over 30 popular file formats directly in your browser.

item_1.content: Free online tool to redact Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, and 30+ other file types.

item_2.content: Redact Word documents in your browser and extract images, text, or metadata.

item_3.content: Free PDF redaction tool that works on any device or platform with no limitations.

index-content-net.head_description: Get all-in-one document parsing solution for {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Extract data from document formats online using simple drag and drop feature
index-content-net.title: Parse documents via {{EnvNameShort}} API
index-content-net.description: Extract data from documents and images on any platform using our flexible APIs and app based solutions for programmers and end-users.
index-content-net.overview_description: API for performing document parsing in {{EnvNameShort}} applications

overview_feature_1.title: Extract data from documents
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} API enables you to retrieve text, metadata, and images from a wide range of file formats such as Office documents, emails, attachments, and archives. This powerful tool helps you efficiently access and process valuable information contained within these files for various applications like data analysis, search engine indexing, or content management systems.

overview_feature_2.title: Parse documents
overview_feature_2.description: Extract various elements such as hyperlinks, tables, QR codes, barcodes and data from PDF forms. Also parse any desired information from documents using custom templates.

overview_feature_3.title: Customizing results
overview_feature_3.description: {{EnvNameShort}} API enables you to retrieve data in various formats such as raw, structured, HTML, or Markdown. Additionally, API offers a search functionality for locating specific words or phrases within the text of documents.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}} features
features.description: Extract data from PDFs, Office Documents, and Images swiftly and accurately

feature_1.title: Extract text
feature_1.content: Extract textual information from various file formats such as office documents, PDF files and images for easy readability and analysis.

feature_2.title: Extract images
feature_2.content: Retrieve visual content from diverse sources like office documents, PDF files for convenient access and use.

feature_3.title: Scan QR Codes
feature_3.content: Detect and decode QR codes present within office documents, PDF files, or visual content for efficient information retrieval.

feature_4.title: Extract data from email attachments and archives
feature_4.content: Gather valuable information from email messages, file attachments, and compressed data sources for effective analysis and utilization.

feature_5.title: Extract tables
feature_5.content: Identify and extract tabular data from PDF documents for organized analysis and use.

feature_6.title: Extract hyperlinks
feature_6.content: Locate and extract hyperlinks and email addresses within office documents or PDF files for efficient access .

feature_7.title: Parse PDF Forms
feature_7.content: PDF Forms are digital documents featuring fillable fields for user interaction, allowing them to input information electronically. .NET API can be utilized to extract data from these forms for efficient processing.

feature_8.title: Parse data by templates
feature_8.content: Create custom templates and utilize them with .NET API to parse specific information from PDF files, simplifying data extraction processes.

feature_9.title: Search a text in documents
feature_9.content: Quickly locate specific words or patterns within documents.
